title: Antarctica: the unowned land
brief_description: Provides an introduction to Antarctica showing landforms, ice and animal life such as penguins and whales. Briefly touches on the impact of humans in the area. The program also spends some time studying the animal life in the Falkland Islands. No other credits available.
